import { React, useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { Header } from '../components/Header' import { MatchDetailCard } from '../components/MatchDetailCard' import './MatchPage.scss' import { YearSelector } from './YearSelector' export const MatchPage = () => { const { teamName, year } = useParams() const [matches, setMatches] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { const fetchMatches = async () => { const response = await fetch( `http://localhost:8080/team/${teamName}/matches?year=${year}`, ) const data = await response.json() setMatches(data) console.log(data) } fetchMatches() }, [teamName, year]) return (

Select Year

Matches of {teamName} in {year}

{matches.length === 0 ? (

Team did not played this season

) : ( matches.map((match) => ( )) )}
) }
